env GO111MODULE=off
cd a

# If no timeout is set explicitly, 'go test' should set
# -test.timeout to its internal deadline.
go test -v . --
stdout '10m0s'

# An explicit -timeout argument should be propagated to -test.timeout.
go test -v -timeout 30m . --
stdout '30m0s'
